meanings.sent1: The horse was outtrotting all the others in the race.
meanings.sent2: She outtrotted her friends during the morning jog.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a race, confident in his outtrotting abilities.
meanings.sent4: His determination to outtrot his own limitations led him to victory.
meanings.sent5: Outtrotting the competition, she crossed the finish line first.

meanings.definition: The act of trotting faster than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The outtrotting of the cheetah amazed the spectators at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: During the race, the outtrotting of the lead horse was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The outtrotting of the snail in the garden race was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His outtrotting of the traffic made him reach the office on time.
meanings.sent5: The outtrotting of the champion horse was a sight to behold.
